alert.note: Alert for Butler (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 29 at 8:23PM CDT until April 29 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BUTLER COUNTY... At 822 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located over Andover, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornado will be near... Augusta and Benton around 835 PM CDT. Towanda around 845 PM CDT. El Dorado around 905 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include El Dorado Airport, Santa Fe Lake and Augusta Municipal Airport. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
